Reviews.Title: “Perfect for City Break - Clean with really friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: P W
Reviews.Content: booked economy double nicely surprised goodsize spotlessly clean 5th floor plenty storage space equally spotlessly clean roomy bathroom bedrooms balcony added space lovely view basilica di santa maria maggiore stress impressed cleanliness clean airy breakfast view basilica di santa maria maggiore people passing food basic fresh nicely service super friendly helpful perfect hotel rome city break termini 2 blocks seriously recommend hotel base city break wont disappointed

Reviews.Title: “Good value small hotel near the central station”

Reviews.Content: stayed base winter sightseeing break rome hotel convenient rail travel car hire larger european tour hotel process renovating lobby floors tidy clean hotel period furnishings character little dated probably renovation hotel quiet provided nights sleep achievement rome breakfast buffet included customer service superb welcome speed checkin arranging explanation romes sites experience

Reviews.Title: “great location”

Reviews.Content: friends stayed 3 nights liked location close shops restaurants 1520 minute walk colosseum breakfast enjoyed pastries ham cheese etc clean surprisingly expected front satisfactory overall stay time rome grazie

Reviews.Content: hotel worst ive stayed dated air shabbiness strangest heard guest spooky worst traffic noise tired wink sleep constant rush traffic finally 2 hrs earlier leave location close oh heat ac control didnt

Reviews.Title: “Good location and excellent staff”

Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights september impressions hotel decor 4star im constitutes 4star pay 3star price apart dated decor cant fault hotel excellent breakfast staff helpful walking distance train station close attractions

Reviews.Content: location perfect close central station bus terminals view balcony looks basillica santa maria hear bell chimes hour clean beautiful decor breakfast variety dishes breakfast staff polite respectful ensured coffee pronto staff front desk happy help queries
